author: wsjcom
title: Don’t Pass Up a Summer Job for Fear of Harassment
text:
Regarding “Summer Jobs Stir Anxiety” (U.S. News, April 30): It isn’t just teenage girls who are sexually harassed at restaurant jobs. While I was working a part-time job last year as a high-schooler, an older male co-worker groped me. My solution was a violent elbowing, and he never bothered me again. Men can be sexually harassed by both men and women. Ignoring this helps no one.
Rhys Larkin
...
